mapper.insert: insert into location_info (id, location_id, "location", location_gis, "status", location_area, location_detail) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{locationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationGis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{locationArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into location_info
id,
location_id,
"location",
location_gis,
"status",
location_area,
location_detail,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{locationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{locationGis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{locationArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{locationDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ON CONFLICT (location,location_area,location_detail) do nothing;
mapper.update:
update location_info
location_id = #{locationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
"location" = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location_gis = #{locationGis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
"status" = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
location_area = #{locationArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location_detail = #{locationDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where location_id = #{locationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update location_info set location_id = #{locationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "location" = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_gis = #{locationGis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "status" = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, location_area = #{locationArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_detail = #{locationDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select location ,location_area as locationArea,location_detail as locationDetail,location_id as locationId from location_info where status=1 and system_flag=1 order by id desc offset #{offset} limit #{pgSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ;

select location ,location_area as locationArea,location_detail as locationDetail,location_id as locationId,system_flag as systemFlag from location_info where status=1 and location=#{location} and location_area=#{locationArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and location_detail=#{locationDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1;
mapper.insert:
insert into location_info
location_id,
"location",
location_area,
location_detail,
system_flag,
status,
#{locationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{locationArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{locationDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{systemFlag} ,
#{status} ,
ON CONFLICT (location,location_area,location_detail) DO UPDATE set system_flag=#{systemFlag} ;
mapper.update: update location_info set location_area=#{locationArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , location_detail=#{locationDetail} , location=#{location}, system_flag=1, status=1, where location_id=#{locationId} ;
